#coursework 

1) Convert the following into machine code:
	1) `addi $s0, $0, 73`
		1) `0b 001000 10000 10000 0000000001001001` - `0x 22100049`
	2) `lw $t1, -7($t2)`
		1) `0b 100011 01001 01010 1111111111111001` - `0x 8D2AFFF9`
	3) `sub $t1, $t7, $s2`
		1) `0b 000000 01111 10010 01001 00000 100010` - `0x 01F24822`
2) Convert the instructions into machine code:
	1) `0b 000100 01111 10100 00000000 00000010`
	2) `0b 000100 11001 10111 11111111 11111100`
	3) `0b 000010 0000 0100 0001 0001 0100 0111 11`
	4) `0b 000010 0000 0100 0000 0011 0000 0000 01`
3) 

![[MIPS Register Allocation Chart.png]]

`C = 12 = 1100`
